赤兔.definition: Red Hare, famous horse of the warlord Lü Bu 呂布|吕布[Lu:3 Bu4] in the Three Kingdoms era

赤匪.definition: red bandit (i.e. PLA soldier (during the civil war) or Chinese communist (Tw))

赤口日.definition: third day of the lunar year (inauspicious for visits because arguments happen easily on that day)

赤嘴潛鴨.definition: (bird species of China) red-crested pochard (Netta rufina)

赤坎.definition: Chikan District of Zhanjiang City 湛江市[Zhan4 jiang1 Shi4], Guangdong

赤坎區.definition: Chikan District of Zhanjiang City 湛江市[Zhan4 jiang1 Shi4], Guangdong

赤城.definition: Chicheng county in Zhangjiakou 張家口|张家口[Zhang1 jia1 kou3], Hebei

赤城縣.definition: Chicheng county in Zhangjiakou 張家口|张家口[Zhang1 jia1 kou3], Hebei

赤壁.definition: Chibi, county-level city in Xianning 咸寧市|咸宁市[Xian2 ning2 shi4], Hubei; Chibi or Red Cliff in Huangzhou district 黃州區|黄州区[Huang2 zhou1 qu1] of Huanggang city 黃岡|黄冈[Huang2 gang1], Hubei, scene of the famous battle of Red Cliff of 208

赤壁之戰.definition: Battle of Redcliff of 208 at Chibi in Huangzhou district 黃州區|黄州区[Huang2 zhou1 qu1] of Huanggang city 黃岡|黄冈[Huang2 gang1], a decisive defeat of Cao Cao 曹操[Cao2 Cao1] at the hands of southern kingdom of Wu; famous episode in the Romance of the Three Kingdoms 三國演義|三国演义[San1 guo2 Yan3 yi4]

赤壁市.definition: Chibi, county-level city in Xianning 咸寧市|咸宁市[Xian2 ning2 shi4], Hubei; Chibi or Redcliff in Huangzhou district 黃州區|黄州区[Huang2 zhou1 qu1] of Huanggang city 黃岡|黄冈[Huang2 gang1], Hubei, scene of the famous battle of Redcliff of 208

赤壁縣.definition: Chibi county in Xianning 咸寧市|咸宁市[Xian2 ning2 shi4], Hubei

赤子.definition: newborn baby; the people (of a country)

赤子之心.definition: pure and innocent like the heart of a newborn; sincere

赤尾噪鶥.definition: (bird species of China) red-tailed laughingthrush (Trochalopteron milnei)

赤峰市.definition: Chifeng, prefecture-level city in Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region 內蒙古自治區|内蒙古自治区[Nei4meng3gu3 Zi4zhi4qu1]

赤崁樓.definition: Chihkan Tower (formerly Fort Provintia) in Tainan, Taiwan (also written 赤嵌樓|赤嵌楼[Chi4 kan3 lou2])

赤嵌樓.definition: Chihkan Tower (formerly Fort Provintia) in Tainan, Taiwan (also written 赤崁樓|赤崁楼[Chi4 kan3 lou2])

赤手空拳.definition: (idiom) with one's bare hands (unarmed – also figuratively: without assistance)

赤朱雀.definition: (bird species of China) Blanford's rosefinch (Agraphospiza rubescens)

赤水市.definition: Chishui, county-level city in Zunyi 遵義市|遵义市[Zun1yi4 Shi4], Guizhou

赤水河.definition: Chishui River, tributary of Wei in Shaanxi

赤眉.definition: Red Eyebrows, rebel group involved in the overthrow of the Xin dynasty 新朝[Xin1 chao2]

赤紅山椒鳥.definition: (bird species of China) scarlet minivet (Pericrocotus speciosus)

赤翅沙雀.definition: (bird species of China) Eurasian crimson-winged finch (Rhodopechys sanguineus)

赤翡翠.definition: (bird species of China) ruddy kingfisher (Halcyon coromanda)

赤胸啄木鳥.definition: (bird species of China) crimson-naped woodpecker; crimson-breasted woodpecker (Dryobates cathpharius)

赤胸擬啄木鳥.pinyin: chi4 xiong1 ni3 zhuo2 mu4 niao3
赤胸擬啄木鳥.definition: (bird species of China) coppersmith barbet (Psilopogon haemacephalus)

赤胸朱頂雀.definition: (bird species of China) common linnet (Linaria cannabina)

赤胸鶇.definition: (bird species of China) brown-headed thrush (Turdus chrysolaus)

赤腳醫生.definition: barefoot doctor; farmer with paramedical training (PRC)

赤腹鷹.definition: (bird species of China) Chinese sparrowhawk (Accipiter soloensis)

赤膊上陣.definition: lit. to go into battle bare-breasted (idiom); fig. to go all out; to come out in the open

赤膽忠心.definition: lit. red-bellied devotion (idiom); wholehearted loyalty; to serve sb with body and soul

赤誠相待.definition: to treat utterly sincerely; open and above board in dealing with sb

赤貧如洗.definition: without two nickels to rub together (idiom); impoverished

赤道.definition: equator (of the earth or a celestial body); celestial equator

赤鐵礦.definition: hematite (red iron ore); ferric oxide Fe2O3

赤頸鴨.definition: (bird species of China) Eurasian wigeon (Mareca penelope)

赤頸鶇.definition: (bird species of China) red-throated thrush (Turdus ruficollis)

赤頸鶴.definition: (bird species of China) sarus crane (Antigone antigone)

赤頸鷿鷈.definition: (bird species of China) red-necked grebe (Podiceps grisegena)

赤麻鴨.definition: (bird species of China) ruddy shelduck (Tadorna ferruginea)
